package Assignment;

import java.util.HashSet;
import java.util.ArrayList;

public class Program13 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		HashSet<String> colors=new HashSet();
		
		colors.add("Pink");
		colors.add("Blue");
		colors.add("Peach");
		colors.add("Black");
		colors.add("White");
		
		System.out.println("HashSet Contains : "+colors);
		
		ArrayList<String> HashSetToArrayList=new ArrayList<String>(colors);
		
		System.out.println("ArrayList Contains : "+HashSetToArrayList);   
		
		HashSetToArrayList.add(2,"Purple");
		System.out.println("ArrayList Contains : "+HashSetToArrayList);  
	}

}
